Новый тип
Количество символов меньше 3
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../../modal/product.mode'; @Component({ selector: 'app-productadd', templateUrl: './productadd.component.html', styleUrls: ['./productadd.component.css'] }) export class ProductaddComponent { hideModal: boolean = false; product: Product = { id: 0, name: '', shortDes: '', description: '', image: '', price: 0, categoryId: 1, applicationTypeId:1 } addProduct() { } Close() { this.hideModal = !this.hideModal } }
